sections.title: Data Controller
content: The person responsible for the collection and processing of your personal data on this platform is the company Agroforja, with CIF 45421346-A and registered office at Ctra Pinillos, S/N, 40393, Pinillos de Polendos, Segovia. For any questions, inquiries or exercise of rights, you can contact us at: info@ecoanuncios.com.

sections.title: Our Philosophy
content: At EcoAnuncios, we take your privacy very seriously. We believe in transparency and mutual respect, values that guide our community. This policy describes how we protect your information when you use our exchange portal.

sections.title: What data do we collect?
content: We collect the information you provide directly for the operation of the service:

items.label: Registration Data
items.text: Username and email address. Your email is strictly confidential and will never be visible to other members or shared with third parties.

items.label: Garden Details
items.text: Information you choose to share voluntarily in your listings to facilitate exchange.

sections.title: Location Protection (Privacy by Design)
content: To safeguard your safety and privacy, we never store or display your exact location. We apply a random offset (between 500m and 1.5km) to your coordinates before saving them in our database. This allows other members to see that there is a gardener in the area, but ensures that no one can know your precise address through the map.

sections.title: Use of Information
content: We use your information exclusively to:
list: Facilitate contact and exchanges between community members.
Send you technical notifications about your offers or account.

sections.title: Third Parties and Advertising
content: We do not share your personal data with third parties for commercial or advertising purposes. The information in your listings is only visible to other members according to your profile preferences.

sections.title: Your Rights (Access, Rectification and Erasure)
content: You have the right to know what data we have about you, to correct it or to delete it.

items.label: Total Control
items.text: You can exercise your right of erasure at any time and immediately through the "Delete account" option available in your user profile. By doing so, your personal data and your listings will be permanently deleted.

sections.extra: You can also send us a manual request to the email of the person in charge indicated above.

sections.title: Updates to this Policy
content: By using EcoAnuncios, you agree to the practices described in this policy. We reserve the right to update this document periodically to reflect changes in our services or for legal reasons. In case of substantial changes, we will notify you through the web or by email.
